hizbs.text: yaayyuha l-nabiyu ittaqi l-laha wala tutiʿi l-kafirina wal-munafiqina inna l-laha kana ʿaliman hakiman
wa-ittabiʿ ma yuha ilayka min rabbika inna l-laha kana bima taʿmaluna khabiran
watawakkal ʿala l-lahi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan

ma jaʿala l-lahu lirajulin min qalbayni fi jawfihi wama jaʿala azwajakumu allai tuzahiruna min'hunna ummahatikum wama jaʿala adʿiyaakum abnaakum dhalikum qawlukum bi-afwahikum wal-lahu yaqulu l-haqa wahuwa yahdi l-sabila

id'ʿuhum liabaihim huwa aqsatu ʿinda l-lahi fa-in lam taʿlamu abaahum fa-ikh'wanukum fi l-dini wamawalikum walaysa ʿalaykum junahun fima akhtatum bihi walakin ma taʿammadat qulubukum wakana l-lahu ghafuran rahiman

al-nabiyu awla bil-mu'minina min anfusihim wa-azwajuhu ummahatuhum wa-ulu l-arhami baʿduhum awla bibaʿdin fi kitabi l-lahi mina l-mu'minina wal-muhajirina illa an tafʿalu ila awliyaikum maʿrufan kana dhalika fi l-kitabi masturan
wa-idh akhadhna mina l-nabiyina mithaqahum waminka wamin nuhin wa-ib'rahima wamusa waʿisa ib'ni maryama wa-akhadhna min'hum mithaqan ghalizan
liyasala l-sadiqina ʿan sid'qihim wa-aʿadda lil'kafirina ʿadhaban aliman
yaayyuha alladhina amanu udh'kuru niʿ'mata l-lahi ʿalaykum idh jaatkum junudun fa-arsalna ʿalayhim rihan wajunudan lam tarawha wakana l-lahu bima taʿmaluna basiran
idh jaukum min fawqikum wamin asfala minkum wa-idh zaghati l-absaru wabalaghati l-qulubu l-hanajira watazunnuna bil-lahi l-zununa
hunalika ub'tuliya l-mu'minuna wazul'zilu zil'zalan shadidan
wa-idh yaqulu l-munafiquna wa-alladhina fi qulubihim maradun ma waʿadana l-lahu warasuluhu illa ghururan
wa-idh qalat taifatun min'hum yaahla yathriba la muqama lakum fa-ir'jiʿu wayastadhinu fariqun min'humu l-nabiya yaquluna inna buyutana ʿawratun wama hiya biʿawratin in yuriduna illa firaran
walaw dukhilat ʿalayhim min aqtariha thumma su-ilu l-fit'nata laatawha wama talabbathu biha illa yasiran
walaqad kanu ʿahadu l-laha min qablu la yuwalluna l-adbara wakana ʿahdu l-lahi masulan
qul lan yanfaʿakumu l-firaru in farartum mina l-mawti awi l-qatli wa-idhan la tumattaʿuna illa qalilan
qul man dha alladhi yaʿsimukum mina l-lahi in arada bikum suan aw arada bikum rahmatan wala yajiduna lahum min duni l-lahi waliyyan wala nasiran
